shlok_english: The VEDAS deal with the three attributes; be you above these three attributes (GUNAS) , O Arjuna, free yourself from the pairs-of-opposites, and ever remain in the SATTWA (goodness) , freed from all thoughts of acquisition and preservation, and be established in the Self.

defs.meaning: pertaining to the three modes of material nature
transcendental to the three modes of material nature
in a pure state of spiritual existence
free from ideas of gain and protection
